component.name: createProjectVersion
component.description: Creates a new version related to a project

component.name: getVersionById
component.description: Returns a version related to a version Id

component.name: updateProjectVersion
component.description: Updates a version related to a version Id

component.name: deleteProjectVersion
component.description: Deletes a version related to a version Id

component.name: getRelatedIssueCountOfVersion
component.description: Returns the number of fixed in and affected issues for the given version.

component.name: getUnresolvedIssueCountOfVersion
component.description: Returns the number of unresolved issues for the given version
